ingredients: 4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 cup butter, 2 cups white sugar, 2  eggs, 2 cups persimmon pulp
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 3g 17%, Cholesterol 24mg 8%, Sodium 111mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 9mg 43%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 62mg 1%
